attributes.title: step out of the tanning booth or get skin cancer i don’t care
attributes.review: what a shame! awful app! some would say worst app! i know many who have said worst app in fact. thought i was going to follow our fascist orange leader but instead i just downloaded a Russian spy app!

attributes.title: WHERES THE SUBSTANCE
attributes.review: there is literally NO useful info on this app, i got it to learn about trumps view points on many of the topics that i care about like black lives matter and how he believes we should get healthcare to working and lower class people but there is NO info about it ANY WHERE

attributes.title: HORRIFYING
attributes.review: I opened the app and was horrified to find a NARCISSISTIC, SEXIST, RAPIST, CHILD MOLESTING, KILLER CHEETO SNAKE!! In addition, the app says “Keep America Great” when in reality it was never that way seeing how it was stolen and also seeing the systematic racism that is still seen today. I would give it zero stars if I can but unfortunately that’s not possible 🧚🏽‍♀️✨🌷🧚🏽‍♀️✨🧚🏻🌹

attributes.title: disgusting!
attributes.review: horrible. absolutely horrible. as soon as i downloaded this app, my family started acting insane! they were violently chanting, “cheese, cheese, cheese!” and they still refuse to stop! this isn’t even the worst part, i started shaking and  flinching uncontrollably and then i dropped my grilled cheese sandwich! now, i must plan an entire funeral for my grilled cheese and nobody can attend! i am loosing thousands of dollars because of this funeral, and only 5 people will be attending! i am mortified with this insane app.

attributes.title: the worst
attributes.review: horrible, i opened the app to just see fat white men screaming make america great again and Trump 2020 as if that’s all they knew how to say. they told me if i didn’t vote for trump i would be executed but the funny thing is those fools don’t know i’m 14. like are you dumb?

attributes.title: Don’t download it!
attributes.review: This is a terrible app, Who decided to make such a horrible app I don’t recommend you to download it because it was trash just like the orange head ☺️ I think that you should rate this app a 1 bc it was absolutely garbage!

attributes.title: Please take this app down
attributes.review: I downloaded this app because I wanted to be updated in Trumps Rallys and my phone suddenly went off like if there was some hacker. App Store needs to take this app down !!! My phone started glitching now I’m scared

attributes.title: couldn’t open
attributes.review: I own a brand new iPhone and this app still did not run. It crashed every time I opened it until I got so frustrated I deepfried that beautiful silver iPhone 11 like one of those tech destruction channels. Written on my Mac

attributes.title: Don't download, it's perverted
attributes.review: It was fine at first but then it started asking for pics of my feet. Ugh so gross. Also before it started asking for the pics, a notice popped up that said. "Do you want to see trumps pp" with cancel or yes underneath. This app is so nastyyyyyyyyy omgggg. 🧜‍♀️🧜‍♀️🧜‍♀️

attributes.title: No
attributes.review: this app is disgusting. as soon as i downloaded it, my phone started to smell like rotting fish. i took it to get it repaired, but my phone shocked the t mobile man when he picked it up. it then started levitating and screeching racial slurs at an extremely loud volume. Bad App
